from pyspark.sql.functions import udf, col, lit, when, coalesce, concat, sum, avg, max, min, count, countDistinct, date_format, to_date, datediff, months_between, year, month,  hour, minute, second, expr, asc, desc

from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

try:
   logInfo("Starting HR Cost Centre dimension setup")
   
   # Create the view if it doesn't exist
   logInfo("Creating view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre")
   
   spark.sql("""
   CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre AS
   SELECT
       RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.CostCentreCode) AS dim_cost_centre_key,
       a.*
   FROM
   (
       SELECT DISTINCT 
           CASE WHEN CostCtr ='' THEN '-1' ELSE CostCtr END AS CostCentreCode,
           CASE WHEN CostCentre ='' THEN '-' ELSE CostCentre END AS CostCentre
       FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_sap_hr
   ) a
   """)
   logInfo("Successfully created view odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre")
   
   # Get distinct cost centre count for verification
   cost_centre_count = spark.sql("SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre").collect()[0]['count']
   logInfo(f"View contains {cost_centre_count} distinct cost centre records")
   
   # Drop the table if it exists
   logInfo("Dropping table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre if it exists")
   spark.sql("""
   DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre
   """)
   logInfo("Table dropped or did not exist")
   
   # Create the table with the view data
   logInfo("Creating table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre from view")
   
   # NOTE: There appears to be an error in your original SQL - it references vw_dim_HR_Personnel_Area
   # instead of vw_dim_HR_cost_centre. I've corrected it below:
   
   spark.sql("""
   CREATE TABLE odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre
   USING delta
   AS
   SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_cost_centre
   """)
   
   # Get count of records in created table
   table_count = spark.sql("SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_cost_centre").collect()[0]['count']
   logInfo(f"Created table with {table_count} records")
   
   # Verify data consistency between view and table
   if cost_centre_count == table_count:
       logInfo("Data verification passed: View and table contain the same number of records")
   else:
       logError(f"Data verification failed: View has {cost_centre_count} records but table has {table_count} records")
   
   # Final success message
   logInfo("HR Cost Centre dimension setup completed successfully")

except Exception as e:
   # Log the exception in detail
   logError(f"Error in HR Cost Centre dimension setup: {str(e)}")
   logException(e)
   
   # Re-raise the exception to ensure the notebook fails properly
   raise e
finally:
   # Always flush logs regardless of success or failure
   logInfo("Flushing logs")
   flushLogging()
